channel.title: SMF 77 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 77 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: SMF 77 Subtype 1
item.description: How to use this documentation? Virtual fields Record fields Maps and sections SMF77PRO SMF77CTL SMF77ENQ Virtual fields Name Based on Description timestamp date time Record Timestamp boost_class fla Boost class: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process, Default: Unknown Record fields Name Based on Description Type/Format date SMF77DTE Date of Record date time SMF77TME Time of Record time timestamp virtual date time Record Timestamp len SMF77LEN SMF RECORD LENGTH. integer seg SMF77SEG SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR integer flg flag SMF77FLG SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS string rrf flg NEW RECORD FORMAT sut flg SUBTYPES USED v4 flg MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa flg MVS/ESA IF ON vxa flg MVS/XA IF ON os flg OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy flg SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE rty SMF77RTY RECORD TYPE integer tme SMF77TME TOD RECORD WRITTEN time dte SMF77DTE DATE RECORD WRITTEN date sid SMF77SID SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION string ssi SMF77SSI SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) string sty SMF77STY SUBTYPE integer trn SMF77TRN NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC integer prs SMF77PRS OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION integer prl SMF77PRL LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION integer prn SMF77PRN NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS integer eqs SMF77EQS OFFSET TO ENQUEUE CONTROL SECTION integer eql SMF77EQL LENGTH OF ENQUEUE CONTROL SECTION integer eqn SMF77EQN NUMBER OF ENQUEUE CONTROL SECTIONS integer eds SMF77EDS OFFSET TO ENQUEUE DATA SECTION integer edl SMF77EDL LENGTH OF ENQUEUE DATA SECTION integer edn SMF77EDN NUMBER OF ENQUEUE DATA SECTIONS integer Maps and sections SMF77PRO Name Based on Description Type/Format mfv SMF77MFV RMF version number in packed decimal format: nnnF integer prd SMF77PRD Product name string ist SMF77IST TOD monitor interval start: 0HHMMSSF time dat SMF77DAT Date monitor interval start: 00YYDDDF date int SMF77INT Duration of monitor interval: MMSSTTTF time sam SMF77SAM Number of samples integer fla flag SMF77FLA Flags string cnv fla Data converted from version 2 invalid_samples fla Invalid samples to be skipped m3r fla Record was written by RMF Monitor III interval_smf_control fla Interval was under SMF control lower_service_level fla SMF record converted to lower service level.

item.title: Field - aql
item.description: Accumulated Q length, same as SMF77QLT Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77AQL

item.title: Field - arch_mode
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF77S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process, Default: Unknown Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - csc
item.description: Total number of contention status change events that occurred during the measurement interval. Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77CSC

item.title: Field - current_owner_number
item.description: NUMBER OF CURRENT OWNER Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77DOW

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length 000TTTTF Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77CYC

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start: 00YYDDDF Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77DAT

item.title: Field - dat_facility1
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dat_facility2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77DTE

item.title: Field - detail_data_req
item.description: DETAIL DATA REQUESTED Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - dfg
item.description: ENQ DETAIL DATA STATUS Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77DFG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description resource_contention 0 RESOURCE IN CONTENTION system_scope 1 ON = SCOPE OF SYSTEMS OFF = SCOPE OF SYSTEM exclusive_owner 2 ON = EXCLUSIVE OWNER, OFF = OWNER SHARES RESOURCE job_wait_for_exc_usage 3 ON = WAITING JOB 1 FOR EXCLUSIVE USAGE, OFF = WAITING JOB 1 FOR SHARED USE job_wait_for_2exc_usage 4 ON = WAITING JOB 2 FOR EXCLUSIVE USAGE, OFF = WAITING JOB 2 FOR SHARED USE global_resource 5 ON = GLOBAL RESOURCE, OFF = LOCAL RESOURCE

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77DTE

item.title: Field - edl
item.description: LENGTH OF ENQUEUE DATA SECTION Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77EDL

item.title: Field - edn
item.description: NUMBER OF ENQUEUE DATA SECTIONS Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77EDN

item.title: Field - eds
item.description: OFFSET TO ENQUEUE DATA SECTION Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77EDS

item.title: Field - enqueue_bad_cpu_clock
item.description: ENQUEUE HAD BAD CPU CLOCK Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - enqueue_processing_abend
item.description: ENQUEUE EVENT PROCESSING ABEND Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - eql
item.description: LENGTH OF ENQUEUE CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77EQL

item.title: Field - eqn
item.description: NUMBER OF ENQUEUE CONTROL SECTIONS Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77EQN

item.title: Field - eqs
item.description: OFFSET TO ENQUEUE CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77EQS

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF77S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - escon_ch
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - escon_dir
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - evt
item.description: Total number of contention events that occurred during the measurement interval. Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77EVT Description A contention event is the period starting from the time when the resource has contention until the resource no longer has contention.

item.title: Field - exclusive_owner
item.description: ON = EXCLUSIVE OWNER, OFF = OWNER SHARES RESOURCE Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: dfg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field dfg.

item.title: Field - exm
item.description: MINIMUM NUMBER OF EXCLUSIVE REQUESTS Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77EXM

item.title: Field - expanded_stor
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - exx
item.description: MAXIMUM NUMBER OF EXCLUSIVE REQUESTS Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77EXX

item.title: Field - fg1
item.description: ENQUEUE STATUS INDICATOR Map: SMF77CTL Based on: SMF77FG1 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description resource_no_contention 1 SPECIFIED RESOURCE HAD NO CONTENTION enqueue_bad_cpu_clock 2 ENQUEUE HAD BAD CPU CLOCK enqueue_processing_abend 3 ENQUEUE EVENT PROCESSING ABEND detail_data_req 4 DETAIL DATA REQUESTED grs_none 5 GRS=NONE mode or local SYSPLEX if set grs_ring 6 GRS=RING, if not set and SMF77NON off grs_mode 7 GRS mode flags SMF77NON and SMF77STR are valid, if set

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77FLA Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 invalid_samples 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III interval_smf_control 3 Interval was under SMF control lower_service_level 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. higher_service_level 5 SMF record converted to higher release or service level.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77FLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time (STCK format) Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77GIE

item.title: Field - global_resource
item.description: ON = GLOBAL RESOURCE, OFF = LOCAL RESOURCE Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: dfg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field dfg.

item.title: Field - grs_interface_problem
item.description: RMF/GRS interface problem Map: SMF77CTL Based on: rf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field rf2.

item.title: Field - grs_mode
item.description: GRS mode flags SMF77NON and SMF77STR are valid, if set Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - grs_none
item.description: GRS=NONE mode or local SYSPLEX if set Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - grs_ring
item.description: GRS=RING, if not set and SMF77NON off Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - grs_sys_problem
item.description: GRS system problems Map: SMF77CTL Based on: rf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field rf2.

item.title: Field - higher_service_level
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77IET

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77IML Description X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval: MMSSTTTF Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77INT

item.title: Field - interval_smf_control
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - invalid_samples
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: TOD monitor interval start: 0HHMMSSF Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77IST

item.title: Field - job_wait_for_2exc_usage
item.description: ON = WAITING JOB 2 FOR EXCLUSIVE USAGE, OFF = WAITING JOB 2 FOR SHARED USE Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: dfg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field dfg.

item.title: Field - job_wait_for_exc_usage
item.description: ON = WAITING JOB 1 FOR EXCLUSIVE USAGE, OFF = WAITING JOB 1 FOR SHARED USE Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: dfg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field dfg.

item.title: Field - jobs_waiting
item.description: NUMBER OF WAITING JOBS Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77DWR

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77LEN Description ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77LGO

item.title: Field - lower_service_level
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number in packed decimal format: nnnF Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77MFV

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77MVS

item.title: Field - nod
item.description: Total number of contention status change events, accumulated during the measurement interval which did not provide specific contention detail data. Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77NOD

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77OIL

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF77S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77PRD

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77PRF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description expanded_stor 0 System has expanded storage escon_ch 1 Equipped with ESCON channel escon_dir 2 ESCON Director in configuration arch_mode 3 System in z/ARCH mode zaap_inst 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed ziip_inst 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed dat_facility1 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 dat_facility2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77PRL

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77PRN

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77PRS

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77PTN

item.title: Field - ql1
item.description: COUNTER FOR QUEUE LENGTH OF 1 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77QL1

item.title: Field - ql2
item.description: COUNTER FOR QUEUE LENGTH OF 2 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77QL2

item.title: Field - ql3
item.description: COUNTER FOR QUEUE LENGTH OF 3 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77QL3

item.title: Field - ql4
item.description: COUNTER FOR QUEUE LENGTH OF 4 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77QL4

item.title: Field - qnm
item.description: RESOURCE MAJOR NAME Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77QNM

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77RAL Description Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77RAN Description This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77RAO

item.title: Field - resource_contention
item.description: RESOURCE IN CONTENTION Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: dfg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field dfg.

item.title: Field - resource_no_contention
item.description: SPECIFIED RESOURCE HAD NO CONTENTION Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - resource_owner1
item.description: CURRENT RESOURCE OWNER 1 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77DO1

item.title: Field - resource_owner2
item.description: CURRENT RESOURCE OWNER 2 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77DO2

item.title: Field - resource_waiter1
item.description: CURRENT RESOURCE WAITER 1 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77DW1

item.title: Field - resource_waiter2
item.description: CURRENT RESOURCE WAITER 2 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77DW2

item.title: Field - rf2
item.description: Additional status flags Map: SMF77CTL Based on: SMF77RF2 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description grs_sys_problem 0 GRS system problems grs_interface_problem 1 RMF/GRS interface problem

item.title: Field - rln
item.description: MINOR NAME LENGTH Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77RLN

item.title: Field - rnm
item.description: RESOURCE MINOR NAME Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77RNM

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF77S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77RTY

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77SAM

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77SEG

item.title: Field - shm
item.description: MINIMUM NUMBER OF SHARE REQUESTS Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77SHM

item.title: Field - shx
item.description: MAXIMUM NUMBER OF SHARE REQUESTS Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77SHX

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77SID

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77SNM

item.title: Field - speed_boost
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77SRL

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77SSI

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77STY

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF77S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77SYN

item.title: Field - sys_owner1
item.description: SYSTEM ID OF OWNER 1 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77SY1

item.title: Field - sys_owner2
item.description: SYSTEM ID OF OWNER 2 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77SY2

item.title: Field - sys_waiter1
item.description: SYSTEM ID OF WAITER 1 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77SY3

item.title: Field - sys_waiter2
item.description: SYSTEM ID OF WAITER 2 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77SY4

item.title: Field - system_scope
item.description: ON = SCOPE OF SYSTEMS OFF = SCOPE OF SYSTEM Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: dfg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field dfg.

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF77S1 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TOD RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77TME

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77TRN

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF77S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF77S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - wtm
item.description: RESOURCE MINIMUM WAITING TIME IN 1024 MICROSECOND UNIT Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77WTM

item.title: Field - wtt
item.description: TOTAL WAITING TIME Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77WTT

item.title: Field - wtx
item.description: MAXIMUM WAITING TIME Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77WTX

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77XNM

item.title: Field - zaap_inst
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ziip_boost
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ziip_inst
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.
